short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your web journey with Bubul: a social network extension. Add bubbles, connect, and share on any site effortlessly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Bubul - Your Social Network Everywhere!

Bubul is a revolutionary Chrome extension that transforms your browsing experience into a social adventure. With Bubul, you can add bubbles of thoughts, ideas, or comments on any website, creating a dynamic social network overlay right on your favorite webpages. Share your insights, discover new perspectives, and connect with others as you navigate the digital landscape.

Key Features:

Bubble Anywhere: Add bubbles to any website you visit.
Real-time Interaction: Engage with others through visible and interactive bubbles.
Privacy Controls: Customize who sees your bubbles and control your social experience.
Seamless Integration: Bubul works effortlessly with your browsing habits.
